sn4.4:1.2: The Buddha had come to Varanasi after his Awakening to teach the five ascetics (SN 56.11). This event is also preserved at Kd 1:13.1.1.
sn4.4:2.1: “Rational application of mind and rational right effort” is yoniso manasikārā yoniso sammappadhānā. The term yoniso (“by way of womb”) indicates that the cause and effect are aligned.
